Can somebody help explain how to setup a TestCase so the setUp method is
executed once for all the tests. I posed this question a week or so ago
a and never received a reply with sufficient detail explaining how to do
it. Somebody suggested I look at the TestSetup class in the extensions
package, but I didn't get very far with that approach.

Any help appreciated.

Grant
subject: Running setUp once for all tests in a test suite
